translations: v.征服，制伏，使服从；克制，抑制（愿望、信仰等）（subjugate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
sentences.translation: 你那因抱负而退居其次的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

sentences.sentence: When the Empire subjugated the watery world, Ackbar was taken prisoner.
sentences.translation: 帝国征服这个水世界后，阿克巴沦为俘虏。

sentences.sentence: Consumer choice will be distorted by and subjugated to the marketing of brands.
sentences.translation: 消费者的选择将被那些市场上的强势品牌所扭曲。
